info.author: Richard Jones
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
You play Bouncy the Hungry Rabbit. You're in a garden with yummy veggies and a 
farmer who's not keen on you eating them. You can hide (and move around) under 
the ground.

Bouncy was written so it could be enjoyed by my daughter, who is about to turn 
3, and by older gamers. Hence it's not a violent game and "easy" is really, 
really easy, and "hard" is challenging.

This game was developed during `PyWeek`__.

__ http://www.pyweek.org
info.name: bouncy
info.summary: You are a hungry rabbit. Eat food to complete the level.
info.html_description:
You play Bouncy the Hungry Rabbit. You’re in a garden with yummy veggies and a farmer who’s not keen on you eating them. You can hide (and move around) under the ground.

Bouncy was written so it could be enjoyed by my daughter, who is about to turn 3, and by older gamers. Hence it’s not a violent game and “easy” is really, really easy, and “hard” is challenging.

This game was developed during PyWeek.
